channel.title: Mdynamics Kraft || 24/7 || Survival || PvP || Creative
channel.description:
ip: Server.Mdynamics.tk
[url=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/210/bannersketchky.gif/][img]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/4900/bannersketchky.gif[/img][/url]
Uploaded with [url=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/url] This..Is..MDynamics! [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/qnv0vo.png[/img]
Hello Mcers! This is MDynamics Kraft, owned by Tricky. We are a dedicated server, with dedicated staff. We have been running for over a year, and have constant updates! Some features we have are:
Up 24/7 Self protecting Flying mod enabled PvP 24/7 Large map, able to build anywhere unprotected Survival Creative Contests Many Plugins Best staff Economy Much more! Join to find out.[/div]
Plugins:
[size=2]ModReq WorldBorder Spout Backup Vault Lockette FirstJoinPlus PvPToggle MultiVerse-core PermissionsEx AutoRank Autoannouncer Essentials Jobs ChatManager WorldEdit AuthMe EssentialsSpawn multiverse-portals EssentialsChat WorldGuard Residence Residencesigns
Forum: http://mdynamics.tk/Forums/Forums2/index.php
Btw, the name comes from the CEO's gaming guild. Give it a try, tell them iTroll sent you :P
